problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC中,∠C=90°,AC=BC,AD平分∠CAB交BC于点D,DE⊥AB,垂足为E,且AB=6cm,则△DEB的周长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠C = N_0, AC = BC, AD bisects ∠CAB intersects BC at point D, DE ⊥ AB, foot of perpendicular is E, and AB = N_1, then the perimeter of △DEB is ()
raw_answer: ∵DE⊥AB,∴∠C=∠AED=90°,∵AD平分∠CAB,∴∠CAD=∠EAD,在△ACD和△AED中,∴△ACD≌△AED(AAS),∴AC=AE,CD=DE,∴BD+DE=BD+CD=BC=AC=AEBD+DE+BE=AE+BE=AB=6,所以,△DEB的周长为6cm.故选B.
raw_comment: 本题考查三角形全等的判定方法,判定两个三角形全等的一般方法有:SSS、AAS、SAS、ASA、HL注意:AAA、SSA不能判定两个三角形全等,判定两个三角形全等时,必须有边的参与,若有两边一角对应相等时,角必须是两边的夹角.
